title: Commercial Letterpress FAQ Update at slowprint.com
content:
We've been updating the FAQ at slowprint.com.  
Would appreciate your feedback, typophiles!  
Got better answers? Better questions?  
Please take a look and let me know!

Cheers!  
Peter

[http://slowprint.com/faq](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017183049/http:/slowprint.com/faq "http://slowprint.com/faq")  
 [http://slowprint.com/contact-us](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017183049/http:/slowprint.com/contact-us "http://slowprint.com/contact-us")
author: peterf
